name: Mazinger Z for Sega Saturn
description:
Mazinger Z for Sega Saturn

It is an amazing adventure in which you must pilot the robot Mazinger Z, to face the evil robots of doctor hell, which tries to dominate the world. You will fly through many parts of the planet destroying enemies.

Burn the CUE on a 700MB CD-R (4X Recommended Speed, ImgBurn 2.5 program).

The game was programmed with C++. It can be played on a real Sega Saturn console using the swap technique. It can also be played with the Yabause emulator. You can download it from the itch.io store and you can study its source code with the book "Video Game Programming: For SEGA Saturn" written by Rolando Fernández Benavidez, distributed on Google Play Books.
